introduction: JST_14301500_110311, as a half-hour multi-screen video work, mainly presents synchronic images before, during and after the 2011 Great East Japan Earthquake. Different channels (including TV broadcasts in different places, personal footages, surveillance camera footages, and online live stream) together constitute the image langdscape of the earthquake event. The entire short film does not need subtitles, and the picture is better than anything else. Just feel the progress of time and events.
